regulation_analysis.rule_name: Detached 2nd-dwelling units & associated parking site planning

Qualifiers.scope: Site planning for detached second dwelling units and their associated required parking.
applicability: Applies to properties with a main dwelling and a detached second dwelling unit.
The provided examples are for an 'Interior lot'.

exclusions.description: The area within the front setback may not be used to satisfy required parking spaces (e.g., for uncovered spaces).

Variables.name: second_dwelling_unit_area
Variables.description: The maximum floor area of the detached second dwelling unit.

Variables.name: garage_area
Variables.description: The maximum floor area of a single-car garage.

Variables.name: rear_yard_setback
Variables.description: Minimum required dimension in the rear yard.

Variables.name: parking_configuration
Variables.description: Describes how parking is arranged (e.g., attached, detached, separate, combined).

Constants.name: max_second_dwelling_unit_area
Constants.description: Maximum area for a detached 2nd dwelling unit.

Constants.name: max_single_car_garage_area
notes: Ambiguous Language: Value is faint in the source text and noted as 'cannot be confirmed with certainty'.

Constants.name: min_rear_yard_dimension
Constants.description: Minimum dimension in the rear yard.
notes: Ambiguous Language: The numerical value is not legible in the source scan.

Relationships.hierarchical: This rule contains four distinct sub-rules (scenarios) for parking configurations, which are presented as examples of site planning solutions.

sub_rules.rule_name: A Detached & separate from main-dwelling parking

Qualifiers.scope: Parking for main and second dwelling are in separate structures.
applicability: Main dwelling has a 1-car attached garage.
Second dwelling has a 1-car detached garage.

Variables.name: detached_garage_location
Variables.description: Location of the detached garage for the second dwelling unit.

Variables.name: distance_from_front_lot_line
Variables.description: Distance of the detached garage from the front lot line.

Constants.name: detached_garage_placement_threshold
Constants.description: Minimum distance from the front lot line for a detached garage to be placed in rear/side yards.

Conditions.logic: IF (detached_garage.distance_from_front_lot_line >= 75 feet) THEN (detached_garage.location MAY BE IN ['rear yard', 'side yards'])
Conditions.description: A detached garage may be located in the rear and side yards if it is at least 75' from the front lot line.
Both dwellings use the driveway for their uncovered spaces, which must be located beyond the front setback.

Relationships.dependencies: The permitted location of the second dwelling's detached garage is dependent on its distance from the front lot line.

sub_rules.rule_name: B Attached & separate from main-dwelling parking

Qualifiers.scope: Parking for the second dwelling is attached to the second dwelling unit itself.
applicability: Main dwelling has a 1-car attached garage.
Second dwelling has a 1-car garage attached to it.

Variables.name: attached_garage_location
Variables.description: Location of the garage attached to the second dwelling unit.

Conditions.logic: IF (garage is attached to second_dwelling) THEN (garage.location MUST BE 'buildable area')
Conditions.description: Because the garage is attached to the second dwelling, it must be located within the buildable area.

Conditions.logic: IF (garage is attached to second_dwelling) THEN (garage.location MUST NOT BE IN ['rear yard', 'side yards'])
Conditions.description: An attached garage for the second dwelling cannot be located in the rear or side yards.
Both dwellings use the driveway for their uncovered spaces, which must be located beyond the front setback.

Relationships.dependencies: The location of the second dwelling's garage is dependent on it being attached to the second dwelling unit.

sub_rules.rule_name: C Detached & combined with main-dwelling parking

Qualifiers.scope: Parking for both dwellings is combined in a single detached garage.
applicability: Both dwellings share a 2-car detached garage.

Variables.name: detached_garage_location
Variables.description: Location of the shared detached garage.

Variables.name: distance_from_front_lot_line
Variables.description: Distance of the detached garage from the front lot line.

Constants.name: detached_garage_placement_threshold
Constants.description: Minimum distance from the front lot line for a detached garage to be placed in rear/side yards.

Conditions.logic: IF (detached_garage.distance_from_front_lot_line >= 75 feet) THEN (detached_garage.location MAY BE IN ['rear yard', 'side yards'])
Conditions.description: A detached garage may be located in the rear and side yards if it is at least 75' from the front lot line.
Both dwellings use the driveway for their respective uncovered spaces, which must be located beyond the front setback.

Relationships.dependencies: The permitted location of the shared detached garage is dependent on its distance from the front lot line.
Relationships.logical: Parking is shared between the main dwelling and the second dwelling.

sub_rules.rule_name: D Combined w/ main-dwelling parking that is attached to main dwelling

Qualifiers.scope: Parking for both dwellings is combined in a garage attached to the main dwelling.
applicability: Both dwellings share a 2-car garage attached to the main dwelling.

Conditions.description: The shared garage is attached to the main dwelling.
Both dwellings use the driveway for their respective uncovered spaces, which must be located beyond the front setback.

Relationships.logical: Parking is shared between the main dwelling and the second dwelling and is physically integrated with the main dwelling structure.
